title: Fix the remake system?
body: The remake system isn't as cool as it should be when you are the one dc'd. But, i dc'd and came back as SOON as they declared remake, rather than stopping the remake from my reconnection, the game decides to end and then put me in lower priority. Why is this possible? I literally reconnect a few second before the remake was declared, that's not right.

replies.body: The system watches for certain things, and once those conditions have been met the team has the option for a remake. This happens because you were gone long enough for it to have made a difference in the overall game, and just because you made it back doesn't mean that your other teammates should have their right for a remake be revoked. You can always read up on how remakes work on the [**remake faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686).
